sentences.en: But this does not vitiate his scholarship.
sentences.cn: 但这不会威胁到他的奖学金。

sentences.en: He got a scholarship to the Pratt Institute of Art.
sentences.cn: 他获得了普拉特艺术学院的奖学金。

sentences.en: He has experience, to say nothing of scholarship.
sentences.cn: 他有经验, 更别提学识了.

sentences.en: He tops the rest in scholarship.
He's been wait-listed for a football scholarship to Stanford.
sentences.cn: 他已被列入斯坦福大学的美式足球奖学金等候者名单。

sentences.en: Her latest publication is a fine piece of scholarship.
sentences.cn: 她最新出版的作品是一部优秀的学术著作。

sentences.en: I made up my mind to apply for a scholarship.
I was thankful that my son had won the scholarship.
sentences.cn: 我感到欣慰的是我的儿子获得了奖学金.

sentences.en: She won a scholarship to go to university.
sentences.cn: 她获得了上大学的奖学金.

sentences.en: She won a scholarship to Iowa State University.
sentences.cn: 她获得了艾奥瓦州立大学的奖学金。

sentences.en: She won a scholarship to study at Stanford.
sentences.cn: 她获得了奖学金，得以在斯坦福大学求学。

sentences.en: Thank you for contributing generously to the scholarship fund.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你为奖学金基金慷慨捐款.

sentences.en: The book is a demonstration of scholarship without pedantry.
sentences.cn: 这本书表现出学术水平又不故意卖弄学问.

sentences.en: The boy who won the scholarship was a quite outstanding student.
sentences.cn: 那个获得奖学金的男孩是个相当杰出的学生.

sentences.en: The committee accorded a scholarship to her.
sentences.cn: 委员会批准给她奖学金.

sentences.en: The girl who won the scholarship was quite outstanding.
sentences.cn: 得奖学金的女孩是相当杰出的.

sentences.en: This is a book that displays the considerable scholarship of its author.
sentences.cn: 这是一本表现作者重大学术成就的书.

words.tran_cn: 博学的；学者风度的；学者派头的
博学,学问,才智,培养,启发
学问,才智,数据,资料,信息

trans.tran_en: an amount of money that is given to someone by an educational organization to help pay for their education
